lines.text: The dramatic story of a goat - a strong dramatic story.
You would spend our last dime for pastry with a hole in it!
Let him alone! Goats are bad luck!
The police are lookin' for that goat! I'm gonna tell!
What did I tell you? We'll get ten years for kidnapping!

[At Stan & Ollie's doorway]
I want you guys to know this is a respectable hotel!
[Behind him, in the hallway, walks a lady of the evening followed by a sailor]
Listen! - You guys are gettin' my goat!
